Text:
Version 7 was released last year and is available here

http://thepiratebay.org/details.php?id=3380695

Even if you get the code, they are locked when transfered to GPS.
What we need is a hack.
I know it's out there, but some people charge for it. I'll keep looking, and will post it here when found.
Hopfully everyone else does the same...
